title: Lao Ma Yu Xiao Bai
synopsis:
Lao Ma, whose full name is Ma Lei and whose online name is "Ma Mou Ren", is a well-known game planner. Many of his mobile games have dominated the top of the "Lemon Best-selling" TOP list for many years. Lao Ma's production style is actually not well received in the game circle, but big companies are still flocking to him, and the core lies in the word traffic. Lao Ma's games have no breakthroughs in mechanism, and most of the games he planned are just reskins, but Lao Ma has a deep grasp of people's hearts, and often a simple small change can make players enjoy krypton gold. On an ordinary and easy-going morning in 2021, this well-known planner was fatefully transported into the mobile game world he designed himself. At first, he went smoothly with his understanding of the game, but gradually things began to collapse more and more. The bad design he made in order to cheat produced all kinds of amazing and strange changes. In addition to Lao Ma himself "enjoying" all this, there is also a new finger named "Xiao Bai" beside him...

(Source: Bilibili, translated)
